languages.text: То были верные слова. Воистину, все есть ничто, и Неумирающий Император есть владыка ничего. Ибо все живет, а после обращается в прах в Смерти. Угодна была Неумирающего мудрость Домин.
Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
languages.original_text: То были верные слова. Воистину, все есть ничто, и Неумирающий Император есть владыка ничего. Ибо все живет, а после обращается в прах в Смерти. Угодна была Неумирающего мудрость Домин.

traits.locale_text: Those were true words. For indeed everything is nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Enim's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
Those were true words. For indeed everything is nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Enim's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Enim's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Enim's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

languages.text: Das waren wahre Worte. Denn alles ist in der Tat nichts, und der Todlose Imperator ist der Lord des Nichts. Denn alle Dinge leben nur, um im Tod zu Staub verwandelt zu werden. Die Weisheit {mf|des|der} Domin erfreute den Todlosen.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Das waren wahre Worte. Denn alles ist in der Tat nichts, und der Todlose Imperator ist der Lord des Nichts. Denn alle Dinge leben nur, um im Tod zu Staub verwandelt zu werden. Die Weisheit {mf|des|der} Domin erfreute den Todlosen.

languages.text: Eran palabras verdaderas. Pues todo es en verdad nada, y el Emperador Inmortal es señor de la nada. Todo cuanto vive se convertirá en polvo al morir. La sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Domin agradó al Inmortal.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Eran palabras verdaderas. Pues todo es en verdad nada, y el Emperador Inmortal es señor de la nada. Todo cuanto vive se convertirá en polvo al morir. La sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Domin agradó al Inmortal.

languages.text: それは真実の言葉だった。すべての者は確かに無であり、不死の皇帝は無の主である。すべて絵の者は死によって地理となるためだけに生きているのだから。ドミンの知恵は、不死の者を喜ばせた。
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: それは真実の言葉だった。すべての者は確かに無であり、不死の皇帝は無の主である。すべて絵の者は死によって地理となるためだけに生きているのだから。エニムの知恵は、不死の者を喜ばせた。

languages.text: 这样的承诺发自真心，因为世间万物确实都是虚无，而不死之神正是虚无之主。一切有生命的东西，死后都会化为尘土。秘者的智慧令不死之神很是满意。
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: 这样的承诺发自真心，因为世间万物确实都是虚无，而不死之神正是虚无之主。一切有生命的东西，死后都会化为尘土。秘者的智慧令不死之神很是满意。

languages.text: La vérité de ces paroles était indéniable. Car tout ce qui existe n'est en effet rien, et l'Empereur Immortel est le maître de rien. Toute chose vivante devient poussière dans la mort. La sagesse {mf|du|de la} Domin plut à l'Immortel.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: La vérité de ces paroles était indéniable. Car tout ce qui existe n'est en effet rien, et l'Empereur Immortel est le maître de rien. Toute chose vivante devient poussière dans la mort. La sagesse {mf|du|de la} Domin plut à l'Immortel.

languages.text: Bu sözler hakikatten ibaretti. Çünkü her şey, hakikaten de hiçbir şeydir. Ölmeyen İmparator ise hiçbir şeyin efendisidir. Çünkü her canlı, yalnızca Ölüm'de hiçliğe dönüşmek için yaşar. Domin'in bilgeliği, Ölmeyen'i memnun etmişti.
languages.original_text: Those were true words. For everything is indeed nothing, and the Undying Emperor is lord of nothing. For all things live only to turn to dust in Death. The Domin's wisdom pleased the Undying One.
